name: Siberia Craft 2: Winter Build
description:
Survive in a tough western Siberia! Build your house in the ice forest. Create weapons to effectively hunt wild animals, bears, wolves, rabbits and deer. At night the zombies rise up and begin to attack your hideout.

Features:
- Endless snowy map
- Many new animals, beasts and zombies
- New weapons, armor, items for construction
- Storms, blizzards, day and night
- The new system of things
- Much more inside!
